snippet.title: ENDLESS™ Dungeon - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Endless Dungeon is a rogue-lite tactical action game, set in the award-winning Endless universe. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, plunge into a long-abandoned space station, and protect your crystal against never-ending waves of monsters…  or die trying, get reloaded, and try again.

--

Sign up for the newsletter to get all the latest on Endless Dungeon: https://bit.ly/3oyRLe1

--

Music by Lera Lynn. Listen to her new album, #OnMyOwn, now!
Website: https://www.leralynn.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/leralynn
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/leralynn
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/2iul6etLF5hjjpxo43rzz7?si=174UpvyDQuygOeIt8_WFOw
Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/artist/lera-lynn/422275122

--

Follow Endless Dungeon on social media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/amplitude
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/endlessdungeon
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/amplitudestudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/endlessuniverse
